member.name: M:FelisOpenXml.FelisShape.Text.FelisTextProperties.SetFontFamily(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Set the special font type to use the special font family. The latin and east asian font will be set if there is not any font type specialized.
member.param: The special font family
The list of the font types wanna be set.

member.name: M:FelisOpenXml.FelisShape.Text.FelisTextProperties.SetFontFamilyAsTheme(System.Boolean,System.String[])
member.summary: Set the special font type to keep the same as the theme. The latin and east asian font will be set if there is not any font type specialized.
member.param: True to set as the major text, False to set as the minor text.
The list of the font types wanna be set.
